mapper.insert: insert into member (member_acc, member_pw, member_name) values (#{member_acc}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name})
mapper.select: select * from member where member_acc = #{member_acc} AND member_pw = #{member_pw}
mapper.update: update member set member_pw = #{member_pw}, member_active = #{member_active}, member_rank = #{member_rank}, member_name = #{member_name} where member_uqid = #{member_uqid}
